courseMaterials.title: Introduction
courseMaterials.description: This material covers the basics of web technology including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courseMaterials.title: JavaScript
courseMaterials.description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript topics including closures, async/await, and ES6 features.

courseMaterials.title: Vue.js Fundamentals
courseMaterials.description: Learn the fundamentals of Vue.js, a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.

courseMaterials.title: Web Design
courseMaterials.description: A comprehensive guide to designing and developing responsive websites.

assessments.title: Quiz 1: HTML Basics
assessments.description: A quiz covering the basic concepts of HTML.

assessments.title: Assignment 1: Build a Person
assessments.description: Create a personal website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

assessments.title: Midterm Exam: JavaScript Essentials
assessments.description: An exam covering essential JavaScript concepts and programming techniques.

assessments.title: Final Project: Develop a Web Application
assessments.description: Develop a fully functional web application using Vue.js and other web technologies learned in the course.
